Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client

Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
Package
Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
Non-blocking HTTP client with an event-driven handler pattern.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
    Class
    Description
    HTTPClient
    HTTP client implementation that creates and manages HTTP connections.
    HTTPClientConnection
    HTTP client connection that handles protocol-level communication.
    HTTPClientHandler
    Handler interface for HTTP client connection lifecycle events.
    HTTPRequest
    Represents an HTTP request to be sent by an HTTP client.
    HTTPResponse
    Represents an HTTP response status delivered to an HTTPResponseHandler.
    HTTPResponseHandler
    Handler interface for receiving HTTP response events.
    PushPromise
    Represents an HTTP/2 server push promise (PUSH_PROMISE frame).
